caption.p: Binding modes of cladosporin and 20 to Pf LysRS1. Pf LysRS1:Lys: 20 showing the binding mode of 20 (C atoms, gold) bound to the ATP site of Pf LysRS1 (PDB ID code 6AGT) superimposed upon Pf LysRS1:Lys:cladosporin (cladosporin C atoms, slate; PDB ID code 4PG3). The image was reproduced from reference 29 by Baraga√±a et al. and adapted for repurposing.
